overview: For two weeks I travelled the Balkans, meeting men on homosexual dating applications. We would go for coffee and then somewhere more private. I would ask them to the read the lines of a character from Aeschylus' 'Prometheus Bound'. Afterwards I would interview them about what it is like to be a homosexual man in the Balkans. This film is a culmination of that journey and those men.
title: Prometheus + the Mermaid
